name: Dismantled
summary:
Dismantled is a survival-horror game about a mad doctor who do experiments on animals and people, sewing parts of them together to create inhuman abominations.It is inspired by old Resident evil games, The suffering games, and by old B-movies, It is built in the GzDoom engine, and is First person as well.
Be aware that my game is full of shocking content and nudity, but for that matter it also contain a censored edition that removes the nudity.
